title: I can't even log into the client...
body: Welp... I think my clients broken.  So 2 days ago, I logged out of my client and for the pass 2 days I've been trying to log in but I can't.  Whenever I try to log in, it just doesn't work.  I'm using a mac but I don't know if that really matters... Any help?

replies.body: What kind of errors do you see when that login doesn't work? It could be an incorrect password/username, or possibly just that the region is incorrect. Let me know a little more about what's actually happening so that I can figure out what exactly is going wrong!
Its like there's the client icon and when it usually works, another icon shows up but now when I click the icon, the second icon shows up but i can't log in because nothing shows up.

Ahaaaa thanks for that additional info! Sounds like this is a simple case of missing admin priveledges. They work a bit differently for Mac's, but follow [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) and you should be able to get it sorted out!
